posts.title: 本地媒体播放测试
posts.text: 1{% dplayer "url=/video/funny1.mp4" "pic=" "loop=yes" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %} (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"video":{"url":"/video/funny1.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 123<video src="/video/Aquaman Trailer 3.mp4" controls="controls">Your browser does not support the video tag.</video> Your browser does not support the video tag. 123<audio controls height="100" width="100"> <source src="/audio/holly.mp3"</audio> Seven Nation Army/Holly Henry Cinco/Ofelia K 1![](/image/57cfb7c2df173.jpg)

posts.title: 远程媒体播放测试
posts.text: 1{% dplayer "url=视频地址" "pic=" "loop=yes" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %} (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"video":{"url":"http://17431793.d.yyupload.com/down/17431793/MV/Kygo - This Town ft. Sasha Sloan - Music Video - Lyrics.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 1{% aplayer "Real Life" "Gill Chang Aviella" "音频地址" %} var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-ZdGuKppl"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "Real Life", author: "Gill Chang Aviella", url: "http://vrok.byethost33.com/audio/Gill Chang Aviella - Real Life.mp3", pic: "", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap);

posts.title: Hexo安装笔记
posts.text: git https://git-scm.comnode.js https://nodejs.org/en/官方下载并一路默认安装打开CMD命令行 12345npm install -g hexo-clihexo init d:\blog\hexod:cd blog\hexohexo s 命令详情参考官方文档：https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/commands.html 正常的话，此时已可以通过浏览器访问“localhost:4000”打开本地搭建的网页了（hexo s 这个窗口不能关闭） 小技巧： 1hexo g -w 1hexo s -s 同时运行这2条命令，可实现网站内容更改后的实时更新
